title.narrative: Creating a Press Office and Radio station Rapa Nui (Easter Island)

description.narrative: The overall project purpose is to give visibility to the historic demands of Rapa Nui in continental Chile and Easter Island particularly regarding their rights to self-determination land and territory and immigration regulation to ensure a sustainable dev elopment. All this in order to promote a democratic and participatory dialogue regarding the aspirations of the people of Rapa Nui.To achieve this the following actions will be executed:? Generate and disseminate information ? both on Easter Island and con tinental Chile - regarding what is happening in political and cultural matters emphasizing on the historical claims of Rapa Nui.? Make visible the demands of Rapa Nui to the general public and decision-makers bodies based in continental Chile.? Broaden dee pen and make a more inclusive and participatory debate on the Island incorporating the views of the various organizations. In particular with regards to the bills of Special Statute and Migration Law.? Make the situation of human rights of Rapa Nui known.A chieving these objectives it will be made through the following means:- Creation of a Rapa Nui Press Office,- Creation of digital media: blog Facebook and a Press Rapa Nui Twitter - Implementation of a radio station Rapa Nui
